comment.body:
New domain:
`yugenmangas.org##.ad-container`

I guess that these rules `###teaser3` are now unrequired, unfortunaly non adguard base users will not have this fixed.

Also, and sorry if it's to unrelated, the Disqus iframe on the bottom of this site `randomscanlators.net/manga/a-espada-do-imperador5)` is removed after 4 seconds, due to this script: 
`https://randomscanlators.net/wp-content/plugins/Remove%20Ads%20Disqus/assets/js/frontend.js`

Fix:
`randomscanlators.net##+js(no-setTimeout-if, removead)`

comment.body:
@umin Please update filters and reload the website.
If it does not work, please follow the following process:
 - Clear site data, cookies and cache of your web browser.
 - Delete TouchEn and BlockTube web browser extension.
 - Close your web browser entirely and re-open it.

comment.body:
I don't see the ads at all on my end.

>  I sent my HAR-file

Nothing suspiciuos, except that I don't notice an injection script, so in that case your browser must use a default certificate, not the AdGuard.
First, find the rule in the AdGuard Base, disable it, then check the google search in Firefox.
After this, do the same in Chrome.
```adblock
@@||www.google.*/search?$domain=google.ae|google.at|google.be|google.bg|google.by|google.ca|google.ch|google.cl|google.co.id|google.co.il|google.co.in|google.co.jp|google.co.ke|google.co.kr|google.co.nz|google.co.th|google.co.uk|google.co.ve|google.co.za|google.com|google.com.ar|google.com.au|google.com.br|google.com.co|google.com.ec|google.com.eg|google.com.hk|google.com.mx|google.com.my|google.com.pe|google.com.ph|google.com.pk|google.com.py|google.com.sa|google.com.sg|google.com.tr|google.com.tw|google.com.ua|google.com.uy|google.com.vn|google.cz|google.de|google.dk|google.dz|google.ee|google.es|google.fi|google.fr|google.gr|google.hr|google.hu|google.ie|google.it|google.lt|google.lv|google.nl|google.no|google.pl|google.pt|google.ro|google.rs|google.ru|google.se|google.sk
```

comment.body:
Also for Chrome try do the following:
1. Clear browser data
2. Open `chrome://net-internals/#sockets` in new tab
3. Press both buttons
4. Restart the browser
5. Open your google search
6. Сheck the certificate by clicking on the lock in the address bar

comment.body:
@piquark6046 
I closed Edge proccess. Removed cookies AND contents 
```
%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Edge\User Data\Default\Cache\
%LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Edge\User Data\Default\Code Cache\
```
Now all seems to be fine.

comment.body:
Не повторяется.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

У них там дикая вёрстка. Из-за этого подтормаживает при скрытии рекламы.
Попробуйте добавить такое правило в пользовательский фильтр
`4pda.to#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'MutationObserver', 'noopFunc')`
